Job Description:
Job Description 

Description:

 He/ she will work closely with lead developers,  architects and data/ business analyst. This person will implement,  test and document as needed. Occasionally the developer will be client interacting,  he/ she should feel confident publicly speaking and explaining technical configurations. This person will be insuring that SpectraMedix product is meeting the highest standards of quality and satisfying its customers.



Essential Duties and Responsibilities:

 2- 4 years of experience with a bachelor degree in any engineering or equivalent technical /  quantitative field.



Very strong in core java (classes,  arrays,  triggers,  collections,  OOPS /  Inheritance,  concurrency,  multithreading,  design patterns)

 Good understanding of data structures and algorithms

 Must have understanding of design patterns

 Excellent knowledge of object- oriented programming

 Strong knowledge of version control systems

 Good communication skills

 Hands on experience of using NetBeans/ Eclipse

 Should be able to complete the task with less supervision.

 Healthcare knowledge candidates are preferred.



Good to have Big data knowledge,  and Spark

 Requirements

 Core Java

 Spring Framework

 SQL

 Junit



Spark (Good to have)
